heading: Today
text: Occasional light snow, moderate at times midday and afternoon.  Additional accumulations 1 to 3 inches south, 2 to 6 inches north. Highs in the teens north, to low 20s south.  Light winds, mainly northeast, becoming northwest 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Snow showers ending south, diminishing north.  Partial clearing west and south of I-89, more clouds northeast.  Lows 5 below to 5 above zero.  Northwest winds near 10 mph, gusting to 25 mph.

heading: Tuesday
text: Some morning clouds northeast, then morning sun giving way to increasing afternoon clouds.  Some snow showers in NY into western VT later in the day.  Highs 10 to 15 north, 15 to 20 south.  Winds light and variable.
